Tool

NameDrop Point Cloud Attributes
ID7
AuthorVolker Wichmann (c) 2010, LASERDATA GmbH

Description

The module can be used to drop attributes from a point cloud. In case the output dataset is not set, the attribute(s) will be dropped from the input dataset, i.e. the input dataset will be overwritten.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Input Point Cloud (input)INPUTPoint cloud to drop attribute(s) from.
Output
Output (*)Point Cloud (optional output)OUTPUTPoint cloud with attribute(s) dropped.
Options
AttributesTable fieldsFIELDSThe attribute field(s) to drop.
(*) optional
